title: London Lady: A Romantic Thriller
description: Desperate for work Claire Fisher becomes a hostess at London’s infamous Double R Club. It’s the height of the swinging sixties and actors and starlets flock in their masses to rub shoulders with the sharp-dressed gangsters who run it. Despite her best efforts not to, she falls for the boss’s right-hand man, Bill ‘Lucky’ Underwood. When he gets mixed up in a suspicious shooting Claire tries to rescue him, only to incur the wrath of the two most brutal gangsters who ever lived.
author: Heather  Hart
